title: PracticeLink Jobs Scraper
description: Extract physician and healthcare job listings from PracticeLink. Search by medical specialty, location, job type, or provide a custom search URL. Automatically extracts detailed job information including salary, requirements, and full descriptions.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific PracticeLink search URL. If provided, this will override specialty/state/city filters.

specialty.title: Medical Specialty
specialty.description: Medical specialty to search for (e.g., 'Family Medicine', 'Cardiology', 'Emergency Medicine', 'Anesthesiology').

state.title: State
state.description: U.S. state to filter jobs (e.g., 'California', 'Texas', 'New York'). Leave empty for all states.

city.title: City (optional)
city.description: Specific city to filter jobs. Works in combination with state filter.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper visits each job detail page to extract full descriptions, requirements, and additional information.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to collect. Set a reasonable limit to control scraping time and cost.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of search result pages to scrape.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for reliable scraping. Residential proxies recommended for best results.
